attributes.action: Replace current Border Forces with members of the armed services
attributes.additional_details: Because the current service cannot be relied upon for constant availability, which creates backlogs and queues for travellers arriving in this country, which damages our international reputation. This situation makes doing business with other nationals unneccessarily difficult and affects many sectors of the economy.
attributes.background: Provide a border force that is available 24/7 every week of the year.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the Home Office and armed forces.
